contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 24, 1971 D Skelmersdale Contest (Section A)
Skelmersdale Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Skelmersdale Contest skelmersdale-contest-section-a
Brookfield School, Skelmersdale, Lancashire, England, UK Best cornet, euphonium and trombone - British Vita. Best horn - North Ashton. Prizes - 1st £30 and cup, 2nd £15 and cup, 3rd £10 and cup. 9 bands competed. 4th annual contest.
April 24, 2013, 11:02 a.m. June 18, 2016, 10:17 p.m.
1 British Vita Works Band John Harrison Blackfriars
2 Tyldesley Band Brian Peacock Prometheus Unbound
3 Linthwaite Silver Band Herbert H. Howarth Lorenzo
4 North Ashton Prize Leslie Naylor Labour and Love
Unknown Result Hatfield Band A. Dinning From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
Unknown Result Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band George Roby Chal Romano
Unknown Result Leigh Silver Band D. Crossley From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
Unknown Result British Aerospace (Chadderton) T. Lawson Scheherazade
Unknown Result Prescot Cables George Lawrenson From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
